Platform.Title: Agilent Mycobacterium tuberculosis Whole Genome Oligo Microarray (8x15K)_condensed
Platform.Description: The Platform data table reflects a condensed representation of the array's replicate features.

Sample.Title: Chelerythrine treated Replicate 1

Channel.Growth-Protocol: Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv was incubated in a rotary shaker. Subsequently, Chelerythrine stock solution, prepared in dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO), and DMSO was added to the culture,respectively. Then, the the cells were further incubated for a certain time.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA extracted using Trizol following manufacturer's instructions
Channel.Label: Cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: The samples were labeled using the Agilent Quick Amp labeling kit.

Channel.Growth-Protocol: Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv was incubated in a rotary shaker. Subsequently, Chelerythrine stock solution, prepared in dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO), and DMSO was added to the culture,respectively. Then, the the cells were further incubated for a certain time.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA extracted using Trizol following manufacturer's instructions
Channel.Label: Cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: The samples were labeled using the Agilent Quick Amp labeling kit.

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: The samples were hybridized with Agilent whole genome oligo microarray,performed by Agilent Gene Expression Hybridization Kit (Agilent p/n 5188-5242)in Agilent’s SureHyb Hybridization Chambers. After hybridization, slides were washed sequential.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Scanned with the Agilent DNA microarray scanner (part number G2505B) using settings recommended by Agilent Technologies. Images were quantified using Agilent Feature Extraction Software (version 10.5.1.1).
Sample.Data-Processing: Agilent Feature Extraction Software (version 10.5.1.1) was used for background subtraction and LOWESS normalization. The 8 microarray data sets were normalized in Agilent Feature Extraction Software (mainly LOWESS normalization), and then genes marked present (P) or marginal (M) in at least 4 out of 8 samples ("All Targets Value") were chosen for further analysis. The resulting file (showing raw and normalized data) extracted from Agilent Feature Extraction Software is linked as a supplementary file on the Series record. The details of the 8 samples are described in a PDF file linked to the Series record (NOTE: The samples 'Plumbagin' and 'chelerythrine' represent the submissions to GEO). The resulting files extracted from Agilent Feature Extraction Software (version10.5.1.1) were imported into the Agilent GeneSpring GX software (version 11.0) for further analysis. Filtering with the Agilent GeneSpring GX software (version 11.0) yielded 3442 genes (as shown in Data table below).

Sample.Data-Processing: Agilent Feature Extraction Software (version 10.5.1.1) was used for background subtraction and LOWESS normalization. The 8 microarray data sets were normalized in Agilent Feature Extraction Software (mainly LOWESS normalization), and then genes marked present (P) or marginal (M) in at least 4 out of 8 samples ("All Targets Value") were chosen for further analysis. The resulting file (showing raw and normalized data) extracted from Agilent Feature Extraction Software is linked as a supplementary file on the Series record. The details of the 8 samples are described in a PDF file linked to the Series record (NOTE: The samples 'Plumbagin' and 'chelerythrine' represent the submissions to GEO). The resulting files extracted from Agilent Feature Extraction Software (version10.5.1.1) were imported into the Agilent GeneSpring GX software (version 11.0) for further analysis. Filtering with the Agilent GeneSpring GX software (version 11.0) yielded 3442 genes (as shown in Data table below).

Series.Title: Mycobacterium tuberulosis H37Rv strains: Control vs. Chelerythrine
Series.Summary: Transcriptional profiling of Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv strains comparing control DMSO treated strains with chelerythrine treated strains. Goal was to determine the effects of chelerythrine against Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv strains.
Series.Overall-Design:
Two-condition experiment,control DMSO treated strains vs. Chelerythrine treated strains. Biological replicates: 2 control replicates, 2 Chelerythrine replicates.
The file showing raw and normalized data (~4645 rows) extracted from Agilent Feature Extraction Software is linked below. Samples details are described in PDF file linked below (NOTE: The samples 'Plumbagin' and 'chelerythrine' represent the submissions to GEO).
